live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
50195.summary: Some customers in the Woodhaven and Brookwood area in Spruce Grove are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
50195.title: June 1 - Spruce Grove ( Woodhaven and Brookwood)  l All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
